{{cpp/iterator/ostreambuf_iterator/title|operator{{=}}}}
{{cpp/iterator/ostreambuf_iterator/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|1=
ostreambuf_iterator&amp; operator=( CharT c );
}}
{{dcl end}}

If {{lc|failed()}} returns {{c|false}}, inserts the character {{c|c}} into the associated stream buffer by calling {{c|pbuf-&gt;sputc(c)}}, where {{tt|pbuf}} is the private member of type {{tt|streambuf_type*}}. Otherwise, does nothing.

If the call to {{c|pbuf-&gt;sputc(c)}} returns {{c|Traits::eof}}, sets the failed() flag to true.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|c|the character to insert}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|*this}}
